idea-plugin.name: cppcheck
idea-plugin.description:
A plugin for JetBrains IDEs to provide inspections for C/C++ files utilizing the static analyzer Cppcheck.

Features:
  • Runs Cppcheck on the fly while you write code
  • Highlights lines and displays Cppcheck error messages
  • Supports passing options to Cppcheck

Usage:
Please refer to Installation.
Known issues:
Please refer to Known Issues.
idea-plugin.change-notes: - Added `Show Cppcheck XML Output` action to show the latest XML output. - Report execution errors as global inspection errors. - Display `Cppcheck Path` configuration errors as global inspection errors instead of using a (hard to spot) status bar message. - Display global inspection error and omit the option if the configured `MISRA Addon JSON` does not exist. - Made plugin verbose level configurable via settings. - Display all available details for findings in tooltip.

action.description: Show the raw Cppcheck --xml output of the latest analysis
